attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i strongly belive we should drop the age limit from 21 to 13.I belive at 13 we no whats good and whats (bad obviously).But its our future wich is in the goverments hands.If THEY dont make the change now.it will be too late.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
